name: Flappy Plane (MatthewwDev)
description:
Hello dear player.
I'm entering the game development business and this is my first game ever created!
It is still a simple game, it is in version 0.1 (02/20/2021).
If you have any suggestions, complaints or questions, send me an email!
My email: matheusmiinigamerl@gmail.com
This game is inspired by the original Flappy Birds game for the beginning of my learning.
I hope you have fun!
Thank you for playing Flappy Plane - MattDev!
